title: Scary Stories to Tell in the Dark
description: Walking corpses, dancing bones, knife-wielding madmen, and narrow escapes from death - they're all here in this chilling collection of ghost stories. Brought to spine-tingling, flesh-crawling life by noted Broadway actor, George S. Irving, these horrific tales are guaranteed to raise goosebumps. Let the faint of heart beware!
author: Alvin Schwartz
